text: Bearly Asleep is a 1955 Disney animated short featuring Donald Duck,FilmAffinity who appears as a park ranger, with Humphrey the Bear. ==Voice cast== * Donald Duck: Clarence Nash * Humphrey the Bear: Jimmy MacDonald ==Home media== The short was released on November 11, 2008, on Walt Disney Treasures: The Chronological Donald, Volume Four: 1951-1961. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:Disney animated movies Category:Donald Duck
title: Bearly Asleep
